edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.templates

Class Shooter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.templates.Shooter

  • public class Shooter
extends Object
    This class runs the shooter, shooter lift, cam, and the optional limit switches monitoring the orientation of the bottom frisbee in the shooter and the height of the shooter
    Author:
    Andrew Vitkus

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shooter(int shooterPort, int camPort, int liftPort)
      This creates a shooter with only the shooter wheel, cam, and lift.
      Shooter(int shooterPort, int camPort, int liftPort, int frisbeeSideCheckPort)
      This creates a shooter with the shooter wheel, cam, lift, and frisbee orientation check.
      Shooter(int shooterPort, int camPort, int liftPort, int topLimitPort, int bottomLimitPort)
      This creates a shooter with the shooter wheel, cam, and lift as well as the top and bottom shooter height limits.
      Shooter(int shooterPort, int camPort, int liftPort, int topLimitPort, int bottomLimitPort, int frisbeeSideCheckPort)
      This creates a shooter with the shooter wheel, cam, and lift as well as both the top and bottom shooter height limits and frisbee orientation check.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      This method lowers the lift.

      This method increases the speed of the shooter by the given amount.

      This method sets the speed at which to spin the shooter wheel.

      This method attempts a shot.

      This method stops moving the lift
      void stopShooter()
      This method stops the shooter wheel from spinning

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shooter

        public Shooter(int shooterPort,
       int camPort,
       int liftPort)
        This creates a shooter with only the shooter wheel, cam, and lift.
        Parameters:
        shooterPort - the CAN address of the Jaguar running the shooter wheel
        camPort - the PWM port the Victor running the cam is attached to
        liftPort - the PWM port the Victor running the lift is attached to

      • Shooter

        public Shooter(int shooterPort,
       int camPort,
       int liftPort,
       int frisbeeSideCheckPort)
        This creates a shooter with the shooter wheel, cam, lift, and frisbee orientation check.
        Parameters:
        shooterPort - the CAN address of the Jaguar running the shooter wheel
        camPort - the PWM port the Victor running the cam is attached to
        liftPort - the PWM port the Victor running the lift is attached to
        frisbeeSideCheckPort - the DIO port the limit switch checking the frisbee orientation is attached to

      • Shooter

        public Shooter(int shooterPort,
       int camPort,
       int liftPort,
       int topLimitPort,
       int bottomLimitPort)
        This creates a shooter with the shooter wheel, cam, and lift as well as the top and bottom shooter height limits.
        Parameters:
        shooterPort - the CAN address of the Jaguar running the shooter wheel
        camPort - the PWM port the Victor running the cam is attached to
        liftPort - the PWM port the Victor running the lift is attached to
        topLimitPort - the DIO port that the limit switch checking the maximum height of the shooter is attached to
        bottomLimitPort - the DIO port that the limit switch checking the minimum height of the shooter is attached to

      • Shooter

        public Shooter(int shooterPort,
       int camPort,
       int liftPort,
       int topLimitPort,
       int bottomLimitPort,
       int frisbeeSideCheckPort)
        This creates a shooter with the shooter wheel, cam, and lift as well as both the top and bottom shooter height limits and frisbee orientation check.
        Parameters:
        shooterPort - the CAN address of the Jaguar running the shooter wheel
        camPort - the PWM port the Victor running the cam is attached to
        liftPort - the PWM port the Victor running the lift is attached to
        topLimitPort - the DIO port that the limit switch checking the maximum height of the shooter is attached to
        bottomLimitPort - the DIO port that the limit switch checking the minimum height of the shooter is attached to
        frisbeeSideCheckPort - the DIO port the limit switch checking the frisbee orientation is attached to

    • Method Detail

      • raise

        public void raise()
        This method raises the lift. If the height limits are enabled, the top limit must not be trigger or the lift will stop instead.

      • lower

        public void lower()
        This method lowers the lift. If the height limits are enabled, the bottom limit must not be trigger or the lift will stop instead.

      • stopLift

        public void stopLift()
        This method stops moving the lift

      • setShooterSpeed

        public void setShooterSpeed(double speed)
        This method sets the speed at which to spin the shooter wheel. If this is higher than the maximum possible speed or lower than the minimum, it is changed to the closest value in range.
        Parameters:
        speed - the speed to set the shooter to spin at

      • raiseShooterSpeed

        public void raiseShooterSpeed(double change)
        This method increases the speed of the shooter by the given amount. The speed is limited as in the setShooterSpeed(speed) method.
        Parameters:
        change - the amount to raise the speed
        See Also:
        setShooterSpeed(double)

      • lowerShooterSpeed

        public void lowerShooterSpeed(double change)
        This method decreases the speed of the shooter by the given amount. The speed is limited as in the setShooterSpeed(speed) method.
        Parameters:
        change - the amount to lower the speed
        See Also:
        setShooterSpeed(double)

      • stopShooter

        public void stopShooter()
        This method stops the shooter wheel from spinning

      • shoot

        public void shoot()
        This method attempts a shot.
